name: Spin The Ball
description:
Prove your skills in this fun physics based basketball game! No hoops, no slam dunks, no rules. Just keep the ball in the air.

This game is for masters of the court only, so don’t let anything throw you off balance. Stay focused and spin away!

Game features:

• 40+ cool skins for the ball
• Challenging to level up
• Realistic basketball physics
• Popping sound effects
